added.description: Dummy flag for testing string handling in WriteableFlags
added.name: DummyManageableStringFlag

added.description: Number of fields in instance limit for scalar replacement
added.name: EliminateAllocationFieldsLimit

added.description: Enable JVMTI asserts related to stack depth checks
added.name: EnableJVMTIStackDepthAsserts

added.description: When HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError is on, the gzip compression level of the dump file. 0 (the default) disables gzip compression. Otherwise the level must be between 1 and 9.
added.name: HeapDumpGzipLevel

added.description: Max number of no progress async deflation attempts to tolerate before adjusting the in_use_list_ceiling up (0 is off).
added.name: NoAsyncDeflationProgressMax

added.description: Print metaspace statistics upon VM exit.
added.name: PrintMetaspaceStatisticsAtExit

added.description: Turn on/off I-U barriers barriers in Shenandoah
added.name: ShenandoahIUBarrier

added.description: How many times to maximum attempt to flush SATB buffers at the end of concurrent marking.
added.name: ShenandoahMaxSATBBufferFlushes

added.description: Turn on/off NMethod entry barriers in Shenandoah
added.name: ShenandoahNMethodBarrier

added.description: Turn on/off stack watermark barriers in Shenandoah
added.name: ShenandoahStackWatermarkBarrier

removed.description: Execute breakpoint upon encountering VM warning
removed.name: BreakAtWarning

removed.description: Clean the chunk pool asynchronously
removed.name: CleanChunkPoolAsync

removed.description: Count jni method invocations
removed.name: CountJNICalls

removed.description: Count jvm method invocations
removed.name: CountJVMCalls

removed.description: Count exceptions that could be replaced by branches due to inlining
removed.name: CountRemovableExceptions

removed.description: Count VM runtime calls
removed.name: CountRuntimeCalls

removed.description: Disable starting of additional Java threads (for debugging only)
removed.name: DisableStartThread

removed.description: standard exit from VM if bytecode verify error (only in debug mode)
removed.name: ExitVMOnVerifyError

removed.description: Force exceptions on FP stack under/overflow
removed.name: ForceFloatExceptions

removed.description: Suppress rewrites of bytecodes in the oopmap generator. This is unsafe!
removed.name: IgnoreRewrites

removed.description: Verify protection domain before resolution in system dictionary
removed.name: ProtectionDomainVerification

removed.description: Forcefully flush non-empty SATB buffers at this interval. Time is in milliseconds.
removed.name: ShenandoahSATBBufferFlushInterval

removed.description: Turn on/off enqueuing of oops for storeval barriers
removed.name: ShenandoahStoreValEnqueueBarrier

removed.description: Back edge threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier0AOTBackEdgeThreshold

removed.description: Threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier0AOTCompileThreshold

removed.description: Switch to interpreter to profile if the number of method invocations crosses this threshold if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier0AOTInvocationThreshold

removed.description: Minimum number of invocations to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier0AOTMinInvocationThreshold

removed.description: Back edge threshold at which tier 4 OSR compilation is invoked (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier40BackEdgeThreshold

removed.description: Threshold at which tier 4 compilation is invoked (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier40CompileThreshold

removed.description: Compile if number of method invocations crosses this threshold (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier40InvocationThreshold

removed.description: Minimum number of invocations to compile at tier 4 (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
removed.name: Tier40MinInvocationThreshold

removed.description: use stack banging for stack overflow checks (required for proper StackOverflow handling; disable only to measure cost of stackbanging)
removed.name: UseStackBanging

removed.description: Print warnings for stalled SpinLocks
removed.name: WarnOnStalledSpinLock
